title: How to decrease the block latency
body:

So any advice on how to decrease the `age` colume?

The latency for block propagation mainly depends on your position in the network. Having more peers might decrease the latency for getting a block, so maybe try to increase your peer count. Also your internet connection speed influences block propagation. 

For the future please use stack overflow for general questions like this.
